questions.question_text: Tyār bād Swāminārāyan mantrano jap karatā shubh sankalponī pūrti māțe divyabhāv ane __________ sahit prārthanā (dhūn) karavī.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 71 is: Tyār bād Swāminārāyan mantrano jap karatā shubh sankalponī pūrti māțe divyabhāv ane bhaktie sahit prārthanā (dhūn) karavī.

questions.question_text: Ā rīte bhakti-bhāve pūjā karīne punarāgaman mantrathī Akshar-Purushottam Mahārājne potānā ātmāne vishe padharāvavā.
questions.explanation: This is the Gujarati translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 72.

questions.question_text: He Aksharbrahma sahit birājmān Purushottam Nārāyan! Āpanī pūjā bhakti-bhāvthī ane __________ ja me sampanna karī chhe.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 73 is: He Aksharbrahma sahit birājmān Purushottam Nārāyan! Āpanī pūjā bhakti-bhāvthī ane divya-bhāvthī ja me sampanna karī chhe.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād satsangnī drudhatā māțe jemā Shrīhari tathā gurunā updesho ane adesho samāyā hoy tevā shāstranu roj vānchan karavu.
questions.explanation: This is the Gujarati translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 74.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād ādar ane __________ bhaktone praņām karavā. Ā rīte pūjā karīne pachhī ja potānā vyavahārnu kārya karavu.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 75 is: Tyār bād ādar ane namrabhāve bhaktone praņām karavā. Ā rīte pūjā karīne pachhī ja potānā vyavahārnu kārya karavu.

questions.question_text: Pūjā karyā vinā jamavu nahī ne pāṇī vagere pan na pīvu.
questions.explanation: This is part of the Gujarati translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 76.

questions.question_text: Vruddhāvasthā, rogādi tathā anya __________ līdhe pote pūjā karavā asamarth hoy tene anya pāse te pūjā karāvavī.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 77 is: Vruddhāvasthā, rogādi tathā anya āpattine līdhe pote pūjā karavā asamarth hoy tene anya pāse te pūjā karāvavī.

questions.question_text: Gharmā pratyek satsangie potānī swatantra pūjā rākhavī.
questions.explanation: This is part of the Gujarati translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 78.
The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 75 is: Evam pūjām samāpyaiva kuryāt sva-vyāvahārikam.
This is the Sanskrit of Satsang Diksha Shlok 71.
